name: Gary Cohn
role: Director of the National Economic Council
summary: Former Director of National Economic Council and Goldman Sachs president who resigned after Trump's Charlottesville response and later said Trump is 'not worth it' for the country.

keyStatements.quote: Citizens standing up for equality and freedom can never be equated with white supremacists, neo-Nazis, and the KKK.
This administration can and must do better in consistently and unequivocally condemning these groups and do everything we can to heal the deep divisions that exist in our communities.
Trump is just not worth it for the country.

timeline.event: Became Director of National Economic Council

timeline.significance: Left over steel and aluminum tariffs

timeline.event: Did not endorse Trump for re-election

credibility.background: Former Director of National Economic Council, former President and COO of Goldman Sachs
